info.title: Enablon SOAP Wrapper
info.description: Wrapper REST endpoints for Enablon SOAP operations. Each operation accepts JSON with credentials and parameters (object or raw XML). The function key must be provided via the x-functions-key header or as query string when creating connection.

x_functions_key.name: x-functions-key
x_functions_key.description: Function key for the Azure Function App. Power Platform will send this header when you configure the connector security as API key with header 'x-functions-key'.

parameters.description: Key/value parameters for the SOAP operation. Example: { "Table": "Event", "FolderId": 123 }

parametersXml.description:
Optional raw XML fragment to be inserted inside the operation tags. If provided, it will be used instead of 'parameters'. Example: "Event
123"

200.description: SOAP XML response from Enablon (returned as text/xml string).

502.description: Bad gateway - error calling Enablon endpoint

200.description: SOAP XML response from Enablon (returned as text/xml string).
